item.title: k8s实践之安装linkerdv2
item.author: root@ysicing.net (ysicing)
item.description: 安装linkerd v2 安装二进制 docker run --rm -v /usr/local/bin:/sysdir ysicing/tools tar zxf /pkg.tgz -C /sysdir 获取相关镜像 1 2 3 linkerd install --ignore-cluster | grep image: | sed -e 's/^ *//' | sort | uniq | awk '{print $2}' | xargs -I {} docker pull {} linkerd install --ignore-cluster | grep image: | sed -e
